class.name: prx_utilities/default_euclidean
class.description: Default euclidean distance as defined by space_t.

class.name: prx_utilities/manhattan_distance
class.description: L1 distance (Manhattan distance)

class.name: prx_utilities/l_infinite_norm
class.description: L-infinite distance.

class.name: prx_utilities/linear_distance_metric
class.description: Simple linear search proximity metric.

class.name: prx_utilities/ann_distance_metric
class.description: Uses ANN to do nearest neighbor queries.

class.name: prx_utilities/graph_distance_metric
class.description: Creates a neighborhood graph for distance queries.

class.name: prx_utilities/null_constraints
class.description: The default constraints class which represents having no constraints.

class.name: prx_utilities/object_collision_constraints
class.description: The constraints class for collisions with objects.

class.name: prx_utilities/goal_state
class.description: Simple goal with a state that we want to reach.

class.name: prx_utilities/multiple_goal_states
class.description: Multiple goal states.

class.name: prx_utilities/radial_goal_region
class.description: A goal region defined by a point and radius.

class.name: prx_utilities/bounded_goal_region
class.description: A goal region that is bounded.

class.name: prx_utilities/goal_plane
class.description: A goal that reasons about planes

class.name: prx_utilities/aggregate_goal
class.description: A goal container class for satisfying multiple goals

class.name: prx_utilities/obstacle_mapping
class.description: Mapping for hiding a system while allowing collisions with it.

class.name: prx_utilities/full_mapping
class.description: Copies the space information into embedded space.

class.name: prx_utilities/hide_mapping
class.description: Mapping for hiding a system.
